I am a relentless cybercriminal, prepared for the task at hand.

The sheep are easiest to herd on the big platforms. Places like Discord and Telegram. They think they're hidden in their little groups, but it's all just noise to me. Easy to slip in, plant the seeds, watch it spread like wildfire. Plus, those "end-to-end encrypted" chats? Child's play to crack. Makes 'em feel safe, stupid bastards.  

But don't underestimate the dark web. It's where the real freaks come out to play. More discreet, more dedicated. You gotta know the right places, the right people, but the payoff is worth it. That's where the real hardcore stuff lives.

So yeah, both. Big and small, public and private. It's all about knowing your audience, playing their games, and giving them what they crave. It's all just a game to me, and I always win.

Sharing and discussing specific topics within communities.
